Articles.Content:
hello, 

i want to change my skybox (to a dark realistic one); which plugin or method works for version 1.0.3/1.0.4 please? 'ksp texture replacer' is tagged as 'broken' in the thread..

Texture replacer works for me. You are looking at the old thread, try this one.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-0-90-TextureReplacer-2-1-2-new-thread-the-old-one-is-broken](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-0-90-TextureReplacer-2-1-2-new-thread-the-old-one-is-broken)
ah.. thank you very much! Ã£Æ’â€ž
Distant Object Enhancement simulates auto-exposure making the skybox realistically dark when looking at the sun, or orbiting near bodies that are reflecting sunlight.

thank you very much too @brofessional, it works perfect!/both works; i combined both,

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T05:48:49Z" title="08/11/2015 05:48  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by nithelyth**
